mapper.select: SELECT FLA.AREANAME, COALESCE((COUNT(CASE WHEN FSL.IGRALM = '1' THEN 1 END)),0) AS '주의(누전)', COALESCE((COUNT(CASE WHEN FSL.IGRALM = '2' THEN 1 END)),0) AS '경고(누전)', COALESCE((COUNT(CASE WHEN FSL.OCALM = '1' THEN 1 END)),0) AS '주의(과전)', COALESCE((COUNT(CASE WHEN FSL.OCALM = '2' THEN 1 END)),0) AS '경고(과전)', CS.totalCount AS '최종수량' FROM F_SENSOR_LOG_${year} FSL LEFT JOIN F_SENSOR_INFO FSI ON FSL.SNSRID = FSI.SNSRID LEFT JOIN F_STORE FS on FSI.STRCODE = FS.STRCODE LEFT JOIN F_LEVEL_AREA FLA on FS.AREACODE = FLA.AREACODE LEFT JOIN F_GROUP FG on FLA.GRPCODE = FG.GRPCODE , ( SELECT COUNT(CFSI.snsrid) AS totalCount FROM F_SENSOR_INFO CFSI LEFT JOIN F_STORE CFS ON CFSI.STRCODE = CFS.STRCODE LEFT JOIN F_LEVEL_AREA CFLA on CFS.AREACODE = CFLA.AREACODE WHERE CFLA.AREANAME = #{area} AND CFSI.DELYN = 'N' ORDER BY CFSI.SNSRNICK ) CS WHERE DATE_FORMAT(FSL.REGDATE, '%Y-%m') = CONCAT(#{year}, '-', #{month}) AND FLA.AREANAME IN (#{area}) AND FSI.DELYN = 'N' GROUP BY FLA.AREANAME

SELECT FLA.AREANAME, COALESCE((COUNT(CASE WHEN FSL.IGRALM = '1' THEN 1 END)),0) AS '주의(누전)', COALESCE((COUNT(CASE WHEN FSL.IGRALM = '2' THEN 1 END)),0) AS '경고(누전)', COALESCE((COUNT(CASE WHEN FSL.OCALM = '1' THEN 1 END)),0) AS '주의(과전)', COALESCE((COUNT(CASE WHEN FSL.OCALM = '2' THEN 1 END)),0) AS '경고(과전)', CS.totalCount AS '최종수량' FROM F_SENSOR_LOG_${year} FSL LEFT JOIN F_SENSOR_INFO FSI ON FSL.SNSRID = FSI.SNSRID LEFT JOIN F_STORE FS on FSI.STRCODE = FS.STRCODE LEFT JOIN F_LEVEL_AREA FLA on FS.AREACODE = FLA.AREACODE LEFT JOIN F_GROUP FG on FLA.GRPCODE = FG.GRPCODE, ( SELECT COUNT(CFSI.snsrid) AS totalCount FROM F_SENSOR_INFO CFSI LEFT JOIN F_STORE CFS ON CFSI.STRCODE = CFS.STRCODE LEFT JOIN F_LEVEL_AREA CFLA on CFS.AREACODE = CFLA.AREACODE WHERE CFLA.AREANAME = #{area} AND CFSI.DELYN = 'N' AND CFSI.STRCODE = 'FS_STR_0000000002240' OR CFSI.STRCODE = 'FS_STR_0000000002241' OR CFSI.STRCODE = 'FS_STR_0000000002242' OR CFSI.STRCODE = 'FS_STR_0000000002243' OR CFSI.STRCODE = 'FS_STR_0000000002244' ORDER BY CFSI.SNSRNICK ) CS WHERE DATE_FORMAT(FSL.REGDATE, '%Y-%m') = CONCAT(#{year}, '-', #{month}) AND FLA.AREANAME IN (#{area}) AND FSI.DELYN = 'N' AND FSI.STRCODE = 'FS_STR_0000000002240' OR FSI.STRCODE = 'FS_STR_0000000002241' OR FSI.STRCODE = 'FS_STR_0000000002242' OR FSI.STRCODE = 'FS_STR_0000000002243' OR FSI.STRCODE = 'FS_STR_0000000002244' GROUP BY FLA.AREANAME

SELECT '비엠시스_구내식당' AS 'AREANAME', COALESCE((COUNT(CASE WHEN FSL.IGRALM = '1' THEN 1 END)),0) AS '주의(누전)', COALESCE((COUNT(CASE WHEN FSL.IGRALM = '2' THEN 1 END)),0) AS '경고(누전)', COALESCE((COUNT(CASE WHEN FSL.OCALM = '1' THEN 1 END)),0) AS '주의(과전)', COALESCE((COUNT(CASE WHEN FSL.OCALM = '2' THEN 1 END)),0) AS '경고(과전)', CS.totalCount AS '최종수량' FROM F_SENSOR_LOG_${year} FSL LEFT JOIN F_SENSOR_INFO FSI ON FSL.SNSRID = FSI.SNSRID LEFT JOIN F_STORE FS on FSI.STRCODE = FS.STRCODE LEFT JOIN F_LEVEL_AREA FLA on FS.AREACODE = FLA.AREACODE LEFT JOIN F_GROUP FG on FLA.GRPCODE = FG.GRPCODE, ( SELECT COUNT(CFSI.snsrid) AS totalCount FROM F_SENSOR_INFO CFSI LEFT JOIN F_STORE CFS ON CFSI.STRCODE = CFS.STRCODE LEFT JOIN F_LEVEL_AREA CFLA on CFS.AREACODE = CFLA.AREACODE WHERE CFLA.AREANAME = #{area} AND CFSI.DELYN = 'N' AND CFSI.STRCODE = 'FS_STR_0000000002239' ORDER BY CFSI.SNSRNICK ) CS WHERE DATE_FORMAT(FSL.REGDATE, '%Y-%m') = CONCAT(#{year}, '-', #{month}) AND FLA.AREANAME IN (#{area}) AND FSI.DELYN = 'N' AND FSI.STRCODE = 'FS_STR_0000000002239' GROUP BY FLA.AREANAME

SELECT '중앙시장(예비)' AS 'AREANAME', COALESCE((COUNT(CASE WHEN FSL.IGRALM = '1' THEN 1 END)),0) AS '주의(누전)', COALESCE((COUNT(CASE WHEN FSL.IGRALM = '2' THEN 1 END)),0) AS '경고(누전)', COALESCE((COUNT(CASE WHEN FSL.OCALM = '1' THEN 1 END)),0) AS '주의(과전)', COALESCE((COUNT(CASE WHEN FSL.OCALM = '2' THEN 1 END)),0) AS '경고(과전)', CS.totalCount AS '최종수량' FROM F_SENSOR_LOG_${year} FSL, ( SELECT FSI.SNSRID FROM ( SELECT * FROM F_LEVEL_AREA WHERE UPAREACODE = 'AREA_000003' AND AREANAME = '원동국제시장' OR AREANAME = '자유도매시장' OR AREANAME = '정원시장' OR AREANAME = '중동번영회' OR AREANAME = '중앙도매시장' OR AREANAME = '중앙상가시장' OR AREANAME = '중앙종합시장' OR AREANAME = '주차타워' OR AREANAME = '제1주차장화장실' ) FLA, F_STORE FS, F_SENSOR_INFO FSI WHERE FSI.STRCODE = FS.STRCODE AND FS.LEVELAREACODE = FLA.AREACODE AND FSI.COMPTYPE = 0 AND FSI.DELYN = 'N' ORDER BY AREANAME ) FSS, ( SELECT COUNT(FSI.SNSRID) AS totalCount FROM ( SELECT * FROM F_LEVEL_AREA WHERE UPAREACODE = 'AREA_000003' AND AREANAME = '원동국제시장' OR AREANAME = '자유도매시장' OR AREANAME = '정원시장' OR AREANAME = '중동번영회' OR AREANAME = '중앙도매시장' OR AREANAME = '중앙상가시장' OR AREANAME = '중앙종합시장' OR AREANAME = '주차타워' OR AREANAME = '제1주차장화장실' ) FLA, F_STORE FS, F_SENSOR_INFO FSI WHERE FSI.STRCODE = FS.STRCODE AND FS.LEVELAREACODE = FLA.AREACODE AND FSI.COMPTYPE = 0 AND FSI.DELYN = 'N' ORDER BY AREANAME ) CS WHERE FSL.SNSRID = FSS.SNSRID AND DATE_FORMAT(FSL.REGDATE, '%Y-%m') = CONCAT(#{year}, '-', #{month})

SELECT '중앙시장(1,2차)' AS 'AREANAME', COALESCE((COUNT(CASE WHEN FSL.IGRALM = '1' THEN 1 END)),0) AS '주의(누전)', COALESCE((COUNT(CASE WHEN FSL.IGRALM = '2' THEN 1 END)),0) AS '경고(누전)', COALESCE((COUNT(CASE WHEN FSL.OCALM = '1' THEN 1 END)),0) AS '주의(과전)', COALESCE((COUNT(CASE WHEN FSL.OCALM = '2' THEN 1 END)),0) AS '경고(과전)', CS.totalCount AS '최종수량' FROM F_SENSOR_LOG_${year} FSL, ( SELECT FSI.SNSRID FROM ( SELECT * FROM F_LEVEL_AREA WHERE UPAREACODE = 'AREA_000003' AND AREANAME = '원동국제시장' OR AREANAME = '자유도매시장' OR AREANAME = '정원시장' OR AREANAME = '중동번영회' OR AREANAME = '중앙도매시장' OR AREANAME = '중앙상가시장' OR AREANAME = '중앙종합시장' OR AREANAME = '주차타워' OR AREANAME = '제1주차장화장실' ) FLA, F_STORE FS, F_SENSOR_INFO FSI WHERE FSI.STRCODE = FS.STRCODE AND FS.LEVELAREACODE = FLA.AREACODE AND FSI.COMPTYPE BETWEEN 1 AND 2 AND FSI.DELYN = 'N' ORDER BY AREANAME ) FSS, ( SELECT COUNT(FSI.SNSRID) AS totalCount FROM ( SELECT * FROM F_LEVEL_AREA WHERE UPAREACODE = 'AREA_000003' AND AREANAME = '원동국제시장' OR AREANAME = '자유도매시장' OR AREANAME = '정원시장' OR AREANAME = '중동번영회' OR AREANAME = '중앙도매시장' OR AREANAME = '중앙상가시장' OR AREANAME = '중앙종합시장' OR AREANAME = '주차타워' OR AREANAME = '제1주차장화장실' ) FLA, F_STORE FS, F_SENSOR_INFO FSI WHERE FSI.STRCODE = FS.STRCODE AND FS.LEVELAREACODE = FLA.AREACODE AND FSI.COMPTYPE BETWEEN 1 AND 2 AND FSI.DELYN = 'N' ORDER BY AREANAME ) CS WHERE FSL.SNSRID = FSS.SNSRID AND DATE_FORMAT(FSL.REGDATE, '%Y-%m') = CONCAT(#{year}, '-', #{month})

SELECT CS.AREANAME, 0 AS '주의(누전)', 0 AS '경고(누전)', 0 AS '주의(과전)', 0 AS '경고(과전)', CS.totalCount AS '최종수량' FROM ( SELECT COUNT(CFSI.snsrid) AS totalCount, CFLA.AREANAME AS AREANAME FROM F_SENSOR_INFO CFSI LEFT JOIN F_STORE CFS ON CFSI.STRCODE = CFS.STRCODE LEFT JOIN F_LEVEL_AREA CFLA on CFS.AREACODE = CFLA.AREACODE WHERE CFLA.AREANAME = '대전종합사회복지관' AND CFSI.DELYN = 'N' ORDER BY CFSI.SNSRNICK ) CS
